data.title: The Chemistry of Triazine Isomers: Structures, Reactions, Synthesis and Applications
data.meta_description: Triazine is the six-membered heterocyclic ring containing three nitrogens, which replace the carbon-hydrogen unit in the benzene ring. Based on nitrogen position present in the ring system, it is categorized in three isomeric forms, i.e., 1, 2, 3-triazine (vicinal triazine), 1, 2, 4-triazine (asymme â€¦
